DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample tissue , blood , bone marrow patient cancer study laboratory may help doctor learn change may occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This laboratory study collect store tissue , blood , bone marrow sample young patient cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Collecting Storing Tissue From Young Patients With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Establish bank cell line and/or xenograft pediatric patient cancer . - Establish continuous cell line , carefully control condition , pediatric patient cancer . - Establish transplantable xenograft immunocompromised mice tumor cell difficult establish continuous cell line vitro . - Create bank cell line generate sufficient vial cryopreserved cell distribution investigator approve COG biology protocol . - Characterize cell line childhood cancer respect DNA short tandem repeat molecular profile `` fingerprint '' original cell line identity . - Characterize cell line ability sustain growth tissue culture and/or mouse xenograft . - Characterize cell line mycoplasma contamination . - Characterize cell line expression molecular maker confirm tumor-type cell line immortal nature cell ( telomerase ) expression molecular marker may correlate drug resistance . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Specimens stratify accord disease ( acute lymphoblastic leukemia v acute myeloid leukemia v lymphoma v osteogenic sarcoma v Ewing family tumor vs rhabdomyosarcoma v primitive neuroectodermal tumor v glioma v astrocytoma v rhabdoid tumor vs hepatoblastoma v retinoblastoma v Wilms tumor v germ cell tumor vs diagnosis ) . Leftover tissue diagnostic procedure and/or surgery cryopreserved bank . Blood and/or bone marrow also collect bank . Cell line establish characterized via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction and/or flow cytometry biomarkers DNA fingerprinting . Markers identify may include follow : - Neuroblastoma : tyrosine hydroxylase , protein gene product ( PGP ) 9.5 , GD2 , HLA class I , HSAN 1.2 antigen - Ewing family tumor : EWS-FLI1 , EWS-ERG , PGP 9.5 - Retinoblastoma : interphotoreceptor retinoid-binding protein - Acute lymphoblastic leukemia : immunophenotype - Alveolar rhabdomyosarcoma : PAX3-FKHR , PAX7-FKHR , MyoD1 - All cell type : telomerase expression include hTR hTERT Mutations TP53 gene detect flow cytometry and/or immunocytochemistry . No result test provide patient , patient 's physician , patient 's medical record . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 500 specimen per stratum accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : All malignant tissue childhood cancer allow include follow : Brain tumor ( type ) Tissue submit CNS Committee Resource lab forward study , unless instruct otherwise COG web site Ewing family tumor Rhabdomyosarcomas Other soft tissue sarcoma Osteogenic sarcoma Rhabdoid tumor Neuroblastomas Viable material cell culture neuroblastoma collect via COGANBL00B1 submit via study unless patient enrol COGANBL00B1* NOTE : *The applies similar biology study disease committee Retinoblastomas Anaplastic Wilms tumor Germ cell tumor Leukemias/lymphomas Acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) Blood sample bone marrow sample patient second relapse beyond may submit study Bone marrow sample diagnosis first relapse must submit AML resource lab forward study discretion AML Committee Acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( ALL ) Blood sample may submit directly study Bone marrow sample must submit ALL resource lab forward study discretion ALL Committee Enrolled COG therapeutic , biology , tissue banking protocol allow collection tissue research submission COGdesignated resource laboratory Participation protocol permit tissue requirement active COG diseasespecific therapeutic , biology , banking protocol satisfy Material may submit protocol tissue available excess require satisfy active diseasespecific therapeutic biological protocol Patients diagnosis pending eligible PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
